data.description: This Enabler Release (ER) document is a combined document of requirements, architecture and technical specification for Always Online Infrastructure Enabler. The AOI Enabler is expected to provide functions of application/service management, connection management, interfaces between AOI Client and AOI Server, interfaces to client applications and server applications and bandwidth optimization.

The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of Always Online Infrastructure (AOI) 1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.
